questions.question: Inside which HTML element do we put the JavaScript?

What is the correct JavaScript syntax to change the content of the HTML element below?

<p id="demo">This is a demonstration.</p>
Where is the correct place to insert a JavaScript?
options: Both the <head> section and the <body> section are correct

questions.question: What is the correct syntax for referring to an external script called "xxx.js"?
The external JavaScript file must contain the <script> tag.
